claims.claim: Incarceration provides an opportunity for personal transformation.
claims.quote: you could tell when a person came in prison how they was, they was ignorant. [...] So you have to begin to know the things that you need to know in order to live a successful life.

claims.claim: Education in prison should aim to reduce recidivism by teaching life skills.
claims.quote: There's a responsibility for you to know.  So you have to begin to know the things that you need to know in order to live a successful life. Live a crime free life.

claims.claim: Supporting others can be a pathway to personal rehabilitation.
claims.quote: Live a life that you can be helpful to someone in some way, and then begin to uplift yourself and follow humanity.
